name: Three Rivers Tech
description: Three Rivers Tech is a comprehensive technology solutions provider serving businesses and individuals throughout the Pittsburgh metropolitan area. We specialize in custom software development, strategic IT consulting, innovative SaaS products, and professional computer repair services. With over a decade of experience, our team combines technical expertise with practical business knowledge to deliver solutions that drive growth and efficiency.
mission: To empower businesses and individuals with reliable, innovative technology solutions that solve real problems and drive measurable results. We believe technology should work for you, not against you.
values: Customer-First Approach: Your success is our success
Technical Excellence: We use proven technologies and best practices
Clear Communication: No technical jargon, just plain English explanations
Reliable Support: We're here when you need us most
Local Commitment: Proud to serve the Pittsburgh community
Continuous Innovation: Always learning and improving our services
